title: No to 10 bans!
body:
What about players who main fizz, yasuo, zed and other really fun champs to play but a little bit ennoying to play against. I'm sure theses champs will be perma baned. why i won't be able to play a champ i really like? Why not learn how to counter theses champs?

Edit: adc and mages mains stop downvoting me :p

replies.body:
> I'm sure theses champs will be perma baned.

Sounds like more of a problem with the champions' health than the bans themselves :^)
Just learn how to play against them

Is that the first thing you tell people when they find a champion annoying?

Do you *really* think it's because we "don't know how to play against them."

Because I feel like you're putting words in my mouth and assume I find them annoying because I don't know how to.

If a Zed kills me twenty times, I'm not going to go "omg OP ninja plz nerf!" I'm going to accept I'm playing like a bad bronze player and deal with it. That has nothing to do with my feelings about champions. I can go 20/0 against a champion I hate and still hate that champion no matter what.

Maybe you should learn how to play other champions. See how useless that advice is and how it lacks context because I'm assuming you don't know how to play other champions, thus generalizing you to make a shitty argument? That's how the generic "just learn how to play against them" sounds when we really, really don't care about whether or not we can counter them.

Jesus.
Well u said the champ is a problem ur contradicting ur self

I said the champion's health. Are you not versed in constructing and analyzing arguments?

Health and balance are two different things. You can balance almost any design in theory, but it doesn't necessarily make it healthy.

Examples: old Soraka, old Sion, old Poppy, old Yorick.

All got reworks specifically reworked in order to promote healthier and/or more cohesive gameplay.
Maybe you dont care but Ive seen enough people say "Fizz has no counterplay so I hate him" or stuff like that lol

Oh, Fizz has counterplay.

But like with Teemo, it's more annoying than what it's worth.

Besides, at least his explicitly unhealthy playstyles got nerfed to hell. Remember old AD bruiser Fizz? Not nearly as bad as Tank Ekko, but yeesh.

Although I'm definitely not advocating nerfs for any of these champions. But if people are against more bans because they don't want their champion permabanned, it's probably worth looking into the champion's health. With the upcoming assassin update, I'm sure most of the "generic permaban" champions mains will be able to rest easy.

Bit worried about Yasuo, tho.
You do realize ranked is not a place for "fun" right? If you want to have fun, play normals.
League of legends is a game to have fun lol it's a game dammit.
Then there wouldn't be separate queues like Normals & Ranked for no reason.
Normal is for practice dude. I'm sure u don't want to play draven for the first time in ranked lol
Bot games are a place for practice. Normals are for the casual game player. How do you not know these things before making an ignorant post?
Haha u think u can really practice against bots?

I'm getting the strong feeling that you troll alot of games and are just an overall toxic player. 

Nice talking to you.
I'm 21 years old and never receive a ban or something for beeing toxic. Sry dude
There's plenty of people who are toxic who never receive bans. Also, Ranked is supposed to be competitive, and it's for people who want to get BETTER not who want to have FUN

Well, I'm not toxic.
And if u play league not for fun, well, maybe there's a lot who think like u, but a video game is made to have fun.
Look, you installed league cz u found the game amazing and fun, if ur not having fun, u would uninstall it. But u keep playing, so ur having fun :)

The thing is some people have fun because it is something serious or competitive, which is why there are people who are toxic. I don't rank a lot so I just do random shit in normals, but I can see how 10 bans can be a problem against people who genuinely like to play champions like fizz or yasuo
Exactly. You said LoL is just a game to "have fun". Would it be "fun" for you if you have a teammate playing Singed ADC in your Ranked game for the fun of it?
This has nothing to do with what we are talking about

actually, it does. Since deeming something fun is off an opinion, his version of fun is different from yours.


Althought I do agree to the no 10 ban thing, honestly 10 bans is just stupid.

Ty for sharing my same opinion
But i didn't say he wasn't right but it's not the subject of what we'r talking about

Common guys... ur right but what does this has to do with what we were talking about?

There's also this thing I like called "normals (draft)". I prefer draft over blind pick because blind is where all the salt happens and where I see 2 Yasuos and 2 Jhins every game. I would like to have my more chill environment of draft mode but not have to be afraid that all the top laners I own/have free access to get banned on the one game I want to switch things up from being bot or mid lane.

133 champs and counting.... 10 bans only bans out 7% of champs

there still are 123 champs to play

i think its great .... more champion diversity in the game ,

for exemple, fizz is not picked a lot, but is baned a lot bcz people find him ennoying. 
Ur not increasing champ diversity in that way, fizz is not instalocked every single game if not baned.

dont see him banned very often... 

and i dont ban him 

but its 10 champs... not 40

Maybe u don't ban him, but others do
And theses champs are baned now, but bans change with time. Who knows what champs will be the most baned after few patches espacially with the new assassins coming?
Ok so what about the players who main theses champs? Forget about fizz now :p they reworked theses champs to be played not to be baned lol

the 10 bans let all players have a say of what they dont wanna face... 

if they are smart they ban 3-4 op champs and then lane counters

but that makes you learn more champs and play more champs

like me for support ... i can play

if they gave us 10 bans, would they have to increase the minimum champion pool for ranked and draft?
Yes, it would go from 16 champions to 20 champions minimum.
They'd have to.

>Edit: adc and mages mains stop downvoting me :p

I'm a support main thank you very much.

When we talk about adc, we'r also talking about supports

And thx for the downvote ^^
Adc and support are NOT the same role..

When ur adc dies to a zed (considering he's not a stupid adc)
That means u both fail to counter him
Ur role in the begining is to protect ur adc. If he dies, u both fail
No, if the ADC dies he's stupid. If you're a good support you can protect him yes, but if he's not good he's gonna fail.

I said he wasn't stupid, than the zed outplayed you both, u think every good adc can sirvive an attak with the help of his  good supp? So why challengers who are really good at the game can die? They are not stupid, but die anw, cz they got outplay both

Thx for the downvote again :D

Fixed that for you. Also now RIOT will finally realise that champs that will have 100% ban rate like the ones that you mentioned are toxic for the overall gameplay and will have no other way but to rework them or nerf them to shit tier, I dont mind honestly since they ruin the experience for everyone in the game. I have a feeling that most people that play those champions are kids/nerds/low self esteem people/toxic people, sorry to every normal person who plays those champs (including myself on very rare occasion).

Random Season 1 veteran.

How dare you change my post! :p

Ok, so, as a "random s1 veteran" how can u say you can't counter theses champs?  

Plz tell me ur post was for fun :D

Mobility has very little counterplay at least in solo queue and is the single most important "stat". For me league went downhill when every champion had to have a dash or some other form of mobility and that totally ruined everyone elses gameplay.

Looks like those players will just have to adapt, and if they cant they deserve to fall down the ladder. Its nobodies fault but their own if they can only play champions like Fizz and Yasuo and cant adapt to them being banned every game.

It's not their fault, when they started the game, they fell in love with their main champs, and were always playing them bcz their was only 6 bans and usually the op meta champs were baned.  But now, they can't because 4 bans were added. I usually ban a random champ(usually ennoying) if i'm the 6th player to ban bcz all the op champs were baned. 
With 10 bans, the probability of my champ if ennoying to be baned is a lot more higher then before.
Riot said they will not delete a champ, but yasuo and zed will be deleted from the game indirectly. It's unfair. Champs are created to be played.

Its unfortunate, but those champions have acquired such a bad reputation as being unhealthy that it will take a while for them to ever leave the ban list. Riot will need to look at what causes all this hatred for them and try to figure out how to make those champions less frustrating. Until that happens these champs will be perma banned.

The fun of the many should always outweigh the fun of the few.

If everyone really hates playing against a champion, then that champion simply should not exist in their current state, regardless of how "fun" they are for the single player playing.
One person shouldn't get to have fun at the expensive of 5-9 others.
cancer champs get banned, they always have been, always will be. also, diversify your champion pool like a smart person and you don't have to worry about all your picks being banned
Some champs are unique. Why i can't play a champ i love?
